pages.text: $(#630000)Deals magic damage to all entities in range of the thrown Brew Sac's splash, but only if the entity has the Wither effect.$(br)Incompatible with, and deals less damage than, Poison Bane. Less mobs are immune to Wither than Poison, however.
$(#630000)Brewed with a Wither Skeleton Skull, dropped rarely by Wither Skeletons in the Nether.
